pizzaProgram.gui
Class CookGUI

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.modules.Module
      pizzaProgram.modules.GUIModule
          pizzaProgram.gui.CookGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventHandler
public class CookGUI
extends GUIModule
implements EventHandler

This class is for initializing the cookgui, since cookview is autogenerated and should not be edited, all initialization and hiding/showing is handled by this class.

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

          A reference to the cookView JPanel

          Stores the reference to the cookViewEventHandler for later use (internally)

          A list of the currently displayed order list, as reference when updating the GUI

          The order that is currently selected by the user
private  ProgramWindow programWindow
          A reference to the program's main window
 
Constructor Summary

          The constructor, which creates the cookView Jpanel, creates event handlers and registers the JPanel at the program's main window
